ComicInfo.Title: We Can Get Them For You Wholesale; Conceptual; Positively Bridge Street; Anatomy Lesson; Book 3, Chapter 3; Aesop's Quickies #1; Aesop's the Horse and the Stag; Aesop's the Wood-Cutter and Godzella; The Hungry Ones

ComicInfo.Summary:
Moral of the story: The self-important rarely see the faults in their own judgments.
Moral of the story: A little glue can cement old friendships.
Moral of the story: Never give a giant woman in a rubber suit the finger.
